effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 677,315 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 275,727.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 61,704 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.

name: Blastfurious Machete
description: The word 'Family' is etched into its hilt.

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
